featured.title: Task Delegation System
featured.summary: AI-powered task management platform that automatically assigns tasks based on team member skills and availability.
featured.impact: Reduced task assignment time by 70% and improved team productivity by 35%
featured.problem: Manual task assignment was time-consuming and often resulted in mismatched assignments based on team member availability and skills.
featured.solution: Built an AI-powered system that analyzes task requirements, team member skills, and current workload to automatically suggest optimal task assignments.
tech_details: Implemented real-time collaboration using Socket.io
Integrated OpenAI API for intelligent task categorization
Built responsive dashboard with React and Tailwind CSS
Created REST APIs with Express.js and MongoDB

featured.title: AI Helpdesk System
featured.summary: Intelligent customer support platform with automated ticket routing and AI-powered response suggestions.
featured.impact: Improved response time by 50% and customer satisfaction by 40%
featured.problem: Customer support teams were overwhelmed with tickets and struggling to provide timely, accurate responses.
featured.solution: Developed an AI-powered helpdesk that automatically categorizes tickets, suggests responses, and routes to appropriate agents.
tech_details: Implemented LangChain for intelligent response generation
Built ticket routing algorithm with priority scoring
Created real-time dashboard with live metrics
Integrated with email and chat systems via APIs

featured.title: CBXMeet - Video Conferencing
featured.summary: Modern video conferencing platform with screen sharing, recording, and AI-powered meeting summaries.
featured.impact: Served 5000+ users with 99.8% connection success rate
featured.problem: Existing video conferencing solutions were expensive and lacked modern features like AI summaries and seamless screen sharing.
featured.solution: Built a comprehensive video conferencing platform with WebRTC for real-time communication and AI integration for meeting insights.
tech_details: Implemented WebRTC for peer-to-peer video communication
Built screen sharing and recording features
Created AI meeting summary using OpenAI API
Optimized for mobile and desktop responsive design

featured.title: Recurring Reminders App
featured.summary: Smart reminder application with natural language processing and cross-platform notifications.
featured.impact: 10K+ downloads with 4.5 star rating on app stores
featured.problem: Users needed a simple way to set complex recurring reminders using natural language instead of complex date pickers.
featured.solution: Created an intelligent reminder app that understands natural language input and provides smart notification scheduling.
tech_details: Implemented NLP for parsing natural language reminders
Built cross-platform mobile app with React Native
Created push notification system with Firebase
Designed intuitive UI with gesture-based interactions

featured.title: Learning Management System
featured.summary: Comprehensive LMS platform with video streaming, progress tracking, and AI-powered personalized learning paths.
featured.problem: Educational institutions needed a scalable platform for online learning with personalized student experiences.
featured.solution: Built a full-featured LMS with video streaming, progress analytics, and AI-driven personalized learning recommendations.
tech_details: Implemented video streaming with AWS CloudFront CDN
Built progress tracking and analytics dashboard
Created AI-powered learning path recommendations
Integrated payment processing with Stripe API

featured.title: AI Product Assistant
featured.summary: Intelligent product recommendation system using machine learning and natural language processing.
featured.impact: Increased conversion rates by 45% for e-commerce clients
featured.problem: E-commerce businesses struggled with low conversion rates due to poor product discovery and recommendation systems.
featured.solution: Developed an AI assistant that understands user preferences and provides personalized product recommendations through natural conversations.
tech_details: Trained ML models for product similarity and user preferences
Implemented conversational AI using OpenAI and LangChain
Built real-time recommendation engine with Python/FastAPI
Created responsive chat interface with React and WebSocket
